item.title: One Man’s Fight for the Right to Repair Broken MacBooks - Columbia News Service
item.description: Louis Rossmann didn’t want to keep paying a couple hundred dollars an hour to a therapist who kept asking him questions about computers. So, in 2012, the repair technician started talking on YouTube instead. It was part life struggles, part repair techniques and part glimpses of what would become Rossmann’s right to repair advocacy. “It … Continued

item.title: CSS Isolation in ASP.NET Core 6.0
item.description: This article will discuss about CSS Isolation in ASP.NET Core 6.0. CSS isolation simplifies an app’s CSS footprint by preventing dependencies on global styles and helps to avoid styling conflicts among components and libraries. CSS Isolation is enabled by default for ASP.NET Core 6.0 Projects. I am using Microsoft.AspNetCore.App 6.0.0-preview.3.21201.13 runtime in this project.
item.author: (Anuraj)

item.title: Gwinnett student challenges suspension over ‘Zoom bombing’ allegations
item.description: Malachi Battle's lawyers say Gwinnett County schools made the accusation based on faulty computer logs provided by Zoom. a problem that could repeat elsewhere since the company’s online sessions are replacing classrooms for millions of students amid the coronavirus pandemic.
item.author: (By Alia Malik, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution)
